title: Reservation
description: A Reservation is a event that is tied to an unique person or resource.

id.description: The UUID identifier of this resource.

description.description: An short description of this Reservation.

dateCreated.description: The moment this resource was created.

dateModified.description: The moment this resource last Modified.

underName.description: The url of a person who is under name(the requester) of this reservation.

numberOfParticipants.description: The number of participants for this reservation.

provider.description: The url of a person or organization who is the provider of this reservation.

broker.description: The url of a person or organization who is the broker of this reservation.

reservationFor.description: The thing -- flight, event, restaurant,etc. being reserved.

reservationStatus.description: The current status of the reservation.

reservedTicket.description: A ticket associated with the reservation.

programMembershipUsed.description: Any membership in a frequent flyer, hotel loyalty program, etc. being applied to the reservation.

priceCurrency.description: The currency of this product in an [ISO 4217] (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) format.

totalPrice.description: The total price of this reservation.
